      • invertersAdjustSortingByWeights

        public static void invertersAdjustSortingByWeights(java.util.List<Inverter> inverters)
        Adjust the sorting of Inverters by weights. This is different to 'invertersSortByWeights()' in that it tries to avoid resorting the entire list all the time. Instead it only adjusts the list slightly.
        Parameters:
        inverters -
